title: Large-Scale Nursing Practice Evaluation Management Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of core nursing concepts and foundational practical training experience
context.additional_context: Competency development program addressing the "failure-to-fail" phenomenon in clinical practice evaluations, combining theoretical learning with field case analysis using a mixed-methods research approach.

learning_goals: Nursing practicum evaluation criteria are clearly understood, and at least three appropriate evaluation tools can be applied
Organizational and psychological barriers occurring when student performance falls below standards are identified at over 80% accuracy, with corresponding strategies developed

Learners can analyze and integrate three or more practical assessment datasets using mixed research methodologies (quantitative statistical analysis + qualitative coding techniques) and write a results interpretation report (within five pages) aligned with research questions.
At least two organizational culture improvement plans are proposed to address recurring failure patterns
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
